EmailTemplate.name: 10-28-21 BNK SelfServ 24 Email 5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR’s New Cash Dispenser Lands in EMEA
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consumers want choice when it comes to payments—whether it’s cash, mobile, check or digital wallets. So you’ll need to meet their demands, while also offering an exceptional, modern experience. And the new exterior through-the-wall cash dispenser for EMEA offers just that. Built for the banking customer of today and tomorrow, NCR’s new SelfServ 24 is centred around customer experience, security and availability. Empower consumers to bank at a time and place that suits them best – and continue to connect the world with cash. Watch our video to find out how it could help you improve your self-service network. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
